reviews.text: Brassica is a high quality, counter serve Mediterranean eatery with tasty build-your-own menu options. I usually get the the hummus bowl with half and half...
Love it. Give me a shawarma pita any day of the week and i will name my first born after you. I dream of this place weekly
Northstar on the front end of the trip, Brassica on the back end. Please, please bring this to Chicago area, specifically Naperville. Fast casual chipotle...
